LanguageData.BetterLetters.SwapOrder.Label: Swap Order of Letters?
LanguageData.BetterLetters.SwapOrder.Tooltip: Should the order of letters on the side be swapped from latest on the bottom to latest on top?
LanguageData.BetterLetters.AllowLetters.Label: Allow Letters at all?
LanguageData.BetterLetters.AllowLetters.Tooltip: If true, no letters will be allowed to be recieved.
LanguageData.BetterLetters.AlertOnBlock.Label: Alert on blocked letter?
LanguageData.BetterLetters.AlertOnBlock.Tooltip: If true, a message will be sent in the top right when a letter is blocked
LanguageData.BetterLetters.Blocking.Label: Enable blocking?
LanguageData.BetterLetters.Blocking.Tooltip: Should letters be blocked based on the filters below?
